about_the_game:
Feluna Base is a peaceful base-building game set on a distant moon. You control adorable animals tasked with establishing an outpost and producing resources for your home station. Every day, a new settler arrives, and a day lasts only 60 seconds. You must ensure that there is enough food and shelter for everyone. If you fail, the run ends, and you get to start from the beginning.

By providing resources for your home station, you unlock blueprints for new buildings. These additional building options provide new ways to structure your base and you can keep them for subsequent runs. Settlers will assist you in constructing buildings, producing resources, and working in specialized professions. This will enable you to establish intricate production chains.

Additional Features

  • Easy-to-understand game mechanics
  • Short game sessions for people with busy lives
  • Time-assist mode for a relaxing experience
  • Top-down (1-bit+) pixel art style
  • Includes various color palettes - or bring your own
  • Decorative blueprints to beautify your base
  • There is a penguin
  • ...and a cat!
